page.title: 13Interesting People In Hoo.
page.content: He's written three books, they have all been about Hoo St. Werburgh. The 1st sold quite well, the 2nd sold very well, and the 3rd didn't sell as well. He is now thinking of writing about the patron Saint of Hoo,{St.Werburgh. Being well known in the area is a big help to him, when writing his books. All of his books have been written since he retired as Deputy Headmaster of the Hundred of Hoo. Due to his job {Mr.Worsdale}had limited time to read books, so has not a favourite writer or book. He has discovered a lot more about Hoo than he ever thought possible in his writing and research. His 3 books are called{'History of Hoo {From 1895 to 1985','The Parish of Hoo {St.Werburgh'and'A Picture Reference of {Hoo' { By Alan Ginn and Chris Share 13 yrs. {}
